about.title: About
about.description: WontanConnect is a global peer-to-peer platform that enables secure currency exchange and shipping coordination. We connect people across borders, making international transactions simpler and more accessible.

features.exchangeDesc: Find local exchange partners with competitive rates
features.shippingDesc: Connect with travelers to send packages globally
features.messagingDesc: Direct communication with your exchange partners

about.trustNote: Our rating system only activates after exchanges are confirmed by both parties. This ensures that reviews are authentic and based on real transactions.

help.title: Help & Support

exchanges.title: How do exchange sessions work?
exchanges.answer: When you find an offer you like, you can request to exchange. The offer owner reviews and accepts or declines. Once accepted, both parties complete the exchange and confirm. After both confirm, the exchange is marked complete.

confirmations.title: How do confirmations work?
confirmations.answer: After meeting and completing your exchange, both parties must confirm in the app. This double-confirmation ensures both sides agree the exchange happened. Only then is the exchange marked as completed.

ratings.title: How do ratings work?
ratings.answer: You can only rate an exchange after it's completed. Ratings are 1-5 stars with an optional comment. Your ratings build your trust profile, helping others decide to exchange with you.

safety.title: Safety tips
safety.answer:
• Meet in public places for exchanges
• Verify the other party's identity
• Never share sensitive financial information
• Use the in-app messaging for communication
• Report suspicious behavior immediately

help.contactSubtitle: Need more help? Reach out to us.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: WontanConnect ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content:
• Account information (name, email, phone)
• Profile data (photo, location, preferences)
• Transaction history
• Messages between users
• Device and usage information

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content:
• To provide and improve our services
• To verify user identity and prevent fraud
• To enable communication between users
• To send service-related notifications
• To comply with legal obligations

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with service providers who help operate our platform, or when required by law.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, contact us at privacy@wontanconnect.com

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to WontanConnect. By using our app, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: WontanConnect provides a platform for peer-to-peer currency exchange and shipping coordination. We do not directly participate in transactions between users.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content:
• Provide accurate information
• Maintain account security
• Comply with local laws and regulations
• Treat other users with respect
• Complete exchanges in good faith

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content:
• Fraudulent or deceptive behavior
• Money laundering or illegal transactions
• Harassment or abuse of other users
• Creating multiple accounts
• Manipulating the rating system

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: WontanConnect is a platform connecting users. We are not responsible for the conduct of users or the outcome of transactions. Use the platform at your own risk.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@wontanconnect.com
